statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email_address, email_preferences FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email_preferences IS NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, preferences FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, preferences->'subscription' as subscription FROM customers WHERE preferences->'subscription' = 'gold';
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience->'age_group' as age_group FROM email_campaigns WHERE target_audience->'age_group' = '25-34';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT customer_id, preferences FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id FROM customer_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, revenue FROM campaigns WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, cm.campaign_id, cp.campaign_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_campaigns cm ON c.customer_id = cm.customer_id JOIN campaigns cp ON cm.campaign_id = cp.campaign_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(campaign_id) AS num_campaigns FROM customer_campaigns GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_campaigns > 2 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT email_address, full_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, preferences FROM customers WHERE email_address = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= NOW();
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email_address = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name FROM customers WHERE preferences->>'language' = 'English';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT c.campaign_name, s.segment_name FROM campaigns c INNER JOIN campaign_segments cs ON c.campaign_id = cs.campaign_id INNER JOIN segments s ON cs.segment_id = s.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_emails FROM emails GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_emails > 5;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE preference_name = 'theme' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT customer_id, email_address FROM customers WHERE preferences->>'newsletter' = 'true';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_emails FROM emails GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_emails > 5;
SELECT e.email_subject, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM emails e JOIN customers c ON e.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE e.sent_date > '2022-02-01' ORDER BY e.sent_date ASC;
